description: Detects keywords from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks
name: Malicious PowerShell Keywords
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(*AdjustTokenPrivileges* OR *IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR64_MAGIC* OR *Microsoft.Win32.UnsafeNativeMethods* OR *ReadProcessMemory.Invoke* OR *SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED* OR *LSA_UNICODE_STRING* OR *MiniDumpWriteDump* OR *PAGE_EXECUTE_READ* OR *SECURITY_DELEGATION* OR *TOKEN_ADJUST_PRIVILEGES* OR *TOKEN_ALL_ACCESS* OR *TOKEN_ASSIGN_PRIMARY* OR *TOKEN_DUPLICATE* OR *TOKEN_ELEVATION* OR *TOKEN_IMPERSONATE* OR *TOKEN_INFORMATION_CLASS* OR *TOKEN_PRIVILEGES* OR *TOKEN_QUERY* OR *Metasploit* OR *Mimikatz*)
author: Sean Metcalf (source)
Florian Roth (rule)
